member.name: IAudioFormatEnumerator.GetCount
member.summary: Gets the number of supported audio formats in the list
member.param: The number of supported audio formats in the list.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: IAudioFormatEnumerator.GetFormat
member.summary: Gets the format with the specified index in the list. The formats are listed in order of importance. The most preferable format is first in the list.
member.param: The index of the item in the list to retrieve.
Pointer to a pointer to a WAVEFORMATEX structure describing a supported audio format.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: IAudioFormatEnumerator
member.summary: Provides a list of supported audio formats. The most preferred format is first in the list. Get a reference to this interface by calling .
